statements: SELECT * FROM courses
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule_details FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 123
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id > 5 ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_id, schedule_details FROM courses ORDER BY instructor_id, course_id DESC
SELECT course_name, schedule_details FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 101 ORDER BY course_id DESC
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE schedule_details LIKE '%Monday%'
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule_details FROM courses WHERE instructor_id IS NOT NULL AND course_id < 10 ORDER BY course_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM courses
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses, instructors WHERE courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, instructor_email FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, instructor_phone FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE courses.course_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM Courses JOIN Schedule ON Courses.course_id = Schedule.course_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM Courses JOIN Schedule ON Courses.course_id = Schedule.course_id WHERE schedule_id = 5;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date, schedule_time FROM Courses, Instructors, Schedule WHERE Courses.course_id = Schedule.course_id AND Instructors.instructor_id = Schedule.instructor_id
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1

SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date, schedule_time FROM Courses, Instructors, Schedule WHERE Courses.course_name LIKE '%Programming%' AND Courses.course_id = Schedule.course_id AND Instructors.instructor_id = Schedule.instructor_id ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses_taught FROM Instructors, Schedule WHERE Instructors.instructor_id = Schedule.instructor_id GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 2
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses, Schedule WHERE Courses.course_id = Schedule.course_id AND start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses ORDER BY instructor_id DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, department FROM instructors WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM courses JOIN schedule ON courses.schedule_id = schedule.schedule_id;

SELECT course_name, day_of_week FROM courses JOIN course_schedule ON courses.course_id = course_schedule.course_id JOIN schedule ON course_schedule.schedule_id = schedule.schedule_id ORDER BY day_of_week ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE department='Computer Science' ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, schedule_id FROM courses JOIN course_schedule ON courses.course_id = course_schedule.course_id WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM courses JOIN schedule ON courses.schedule_id = schedule.schedule_id WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time FROM schedule WHERE schedule_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_id, instructor_id, schedule_date FROM schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.course_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT instructor_name, schedule_date FROM instructors INNER JOIN schedule ON instructors.instructor_id = schedule.instructor_id;

SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM courses INNER JOIN schedule ON courses.course_id = schedule.course_id INNER JOIN instructors ON schedule.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, schedule_time ASC;
